title: A CaMn_4O_2 model of the biological oxygen evolving complex: synthesis via cluster expansion on a low symmetry ligand
abstract: Using a new multinucleating ligand featuring two dipyridyl alkoxide moieties and a carboxylate moiety, low symmetry tetranuclear complexes 1-M (M = Mn, Fe, and Co) have been synthesized. Complex 1-Mn was used as a precursor for the synthesis of a pentanuclear CaMn_4O_2 cluster (3) with the same metal stoichiometry as the biological OEC.
